snippet: Netflix stock jumped after it said it would expand in Asia, while Barnes & Noble shares dropped 16 percent after a gloomy first-quarter report.
abstract: Stocks surge in morning only to tumble into afternoon sell-off based on Labor Dept report suggesting Federal Reserve may soon raise interest rates.
lead_paragraph: Netflix stock jumped after it said it would expand in Asia, while Barnes & Noble shares dropped 16 percent after a gloomy first-quarter report.

headline.main: After Early Rally, the Market Closes With a Thud
headline.print_headline: Morning of Optimism Turns Into Afternoon of Gloom
